title: Saint Kotar

Repack Features

  • Based on Saint.Kotar-CODEX ISO release: codex-saint.kotar.iso (2,846,130,176 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 2.7 to 1.9 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-6 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 7.5 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

“Stranger, what is Saint Kotar to you?”
Saint Kotar is a psychological horror quest in a picturesque and dystopian world. Immerse yourself in the breathtaking atmosphere of an ancient and perilous place where occult witchcraft rules, every corner is hand-painted, and a creepy original soundtrack accompanies you to the very end.

Every action you take will affect the course of the game, from the actions of the other characters to choosing one of the many endings. Twenty hours of challenging gameplay lie ahead – and just one question… Will you be able to regain your humanity, or will you find only madness and doom?

“Fear not, do not tremble in fear…”
October 1996 is drawing to a close. Together with Benedek Dohnany and Nikolai Kaliakin, you wake up from nightmares in a house on the very outskirts of the town of Svyatij Kotar, in Croatia. In someone else’s house that you’ve never seen… But why does the thought persist in your head that everything here is wrong and unclean?

“This city dances on the edge of Hell itself…”
You’ve been brought to this mysterious town by a missing family member–and the disappearance of a loved one could be linked to a series of gruesome murders… and to the supernatural mysteries of St. Cotar, a small town that seems to be caught between two realities. Even a holy place can turn out to be a dark and sinister breeding ground for creepy witchcraft…

“Change your reality, my son.”
Help two servants of God find clarity and direction in the world and find a missing relative. Each of them sees the world differently: by switching between the characters, you can see the world through their eyes and understand what drives them… And how you see the world will determine the outcome of this story.

Game Features

  • A psychological horror in which a man’s road to faith is intertwined with occult mysteries and the terrors of madness.
  • A unique atmosphere of the inscrutable.
  • Hidden from the world the town of Sveti Kotar in the heart of Croatia – with its rich history and many nooks and crannies hiding sinister secrets.
  • Up to twenty hours of gameplay with a variety of endings and plot twists.
  • Two unlikeable playable characters – and each sees a different reality.
  • Any choice made by one character can affect the future of the other.
  • A hand-drawn game world full of gloom and despair.
  • The game is fully voiced by professional actors.
  • Original soundtrack imbued with superstitious fear.
